roles.title: Role Management
roles.description: Manage system roles and permission configurations.
roles.dialogs.create.title: Create Role
roles.dialogs.create.description: Create a new role and configure its permission scopes.
roles.dialogs.edit.title: Edit Role
roles.dialogs.edit.description: Modify role information and permission configuration.
roles.dialogs.delete.title: Delete Role
roles.dialogs.delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this role? This action cannot be undone.
roles.dialogs.bulkDelete.title: Bulk Delete Roles
roles.dialogs.bulkDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected roles? This action cannot be undone.
roles.dialogs.fields.name.label: Role Name
roles.dialogs.fields.scopes.label: Permission Scopes
roles.dialogs.fields.scopes.description: Select the permissions this role has
roles.validation.scopesRequired: At least one permission is required
